description: Gaia Way is an initiative born from a deep-rooted need to reconnect human activity with nature, addressing environmental degradation in the Cabrita farm area. Established 30 years ago, it focuses on sustainable practices, organic farming, and community involvement. The project emphasizes holistic health through nutritious food, leveraging permaculture and agroecology principles. Gaia also participates in local organic markets, promoting awareness of the benefits of organic produce while fostering a culture of ecological responsibility.
name: Gaia Way
